li.span: Mar. 2nd All-Star Basketball games starting at 6:30pm (Milburn Gymnasium)

font.span: Apr. 24th School will be in session for make up day

p.span: TO: Parents of High School Juniors
MILBURN PUBLIC SCHOOL is communicating with parents of students who will be juniors during the 2019-20 school year.
Our school district plans to administer the ACT test in spring 2020 to eligible juniors as part of the state contract with the Oklahoma State Department of Education and ACT.

Last year over 95% of Oklahoma schools selected to administer the ACT. Our district believes this is an excellent opportunity for all eligible juniors to take the ACT at no cost to them or their families.
Additional information on why we chose the ACT can be found at:

a.span: 8 Reasons to Choose the ACT Test

p.span: Should you have any questions/comments, please reply to 580-443-5522/SHELLY LANSDALE.

span.em: Special thanks to Walmart for the grant we recieved that assisted in the purchase of our new audiometer!

div.p: Check out Milburn School’s report card

span.strong: Milburn Public School District would like to inform parents about child find opportunities. All children age 3 through the age of 21 suspected of having a disability should be identified and evaluated. If you have a child with a suspected disability, please contact Special Education Services at Milburn Schools.
